mapper.select: SELECT t.teacherId_n AS teacherId, t.number_x AS number, t.name_m AS name, t.facultyId_n AS facultyId, t.age_n AS age, t.sex_n AS sex, t.birth_dt AS birthDate, t.create_dt AS createDate, t.create_m AS createBy, t.update_dt AS updateDate, t.update_m AS updateBy, f.name_m AS facultyName, DATE_FORMAT(t.birth_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthDateStr FROM ems_teacher t LEFT JOIN ems_faculty f ON t.facultyId_n = f.facultyId_n WHERE t.teacherId_n = #{teacherId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE ems_teacher SET name_m = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age_n = #{age, jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex_n = #{sex, jdbcType=INTEGER}, birth_dt = #{birthDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dt = #{updateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_m = #{updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE teacherId_n = #{teacherId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
